metadata.title: CVE-2022-2865 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions before 15.1.6, 15.2 to 15.2.4 and 15.3 prior to 15.3.2. It waspossible to exploit a vulnerability in setting the labels colour featurewhich could lead to a stored XSS that allowed attackers to performarbitrary actions on behalf of victims at client side.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
